I uncommented the li=
ne

# com.sun.management.jmxremote.local.only=3Dfalse

in jre/lib/managemen=
t/management.properties in accordance with the
workaround in this link 
htt=
p://bugs.sun.com/bugdatabase/view_bug.do?bug_id=3D6754672

Now I can connec=

couldn't get why I ne=
ed this change.
